law.catch_line: Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, this section applies to:...

section.section:
Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, this section applies to:
each unit of the State government; and
each unit that:
is created by general law; and
operates in 2 or more counties.
This section does not apply to a bicounty commission that county governing bodies appoint if those bodies also review the budget of the commission.
